name: Sacritice
description:
Once a year on October 31st a person is chosen to give their face to God.

And today is your turn.  

Navigate through a mysterious gallery in an attempt to save yourself, will you make the right decisions? Or will you fall victim to your impulses.

a short rpg game with 3 endings, made in 6 days for the Spooktober Jam !  Made by Me and My friend

 And a thanks to Mr. Trivel  for their plugins!

if you encounter any errors or bugs don't hesitate to message me! I'll remove them as soon as I can.
